Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Increases the penalties for certain unlawful discriminatory practices based on the lawful source of income of the victim
Summary: Increases the penalties for housing related unlawful discriminatory practices based on the lawful source of income of the victim where the respondent receives federal, state or local tax benefits for the housing accommodation at issue.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to increasing the penalties for certain unlawful discriminatory practices based on the lawful source of income of the victim
